definition: to compensate for loss/to indemnify/to suffer a financial loss
to repay/to compensate for/to recompense/to fulfill (hopes etc)
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The relief the plaintiff sought was an injunction and damages.
sentences.chinese: 原告請求的救濟爲強制令和損害賠償金。

sentences.english: They paid an indemnity to the victim after the accident.
sentences.chinese: 他們在事故後向受害者付了賠償金。

sentences.english: The amount ofd am ages is governed by the seriousness of the injury suffer.
sentences.chinese: 損失賠償金的金額取決於所遭損害的嚴重程度。

sentences.english: The compensation does not come out of FA funds.
sentences.chinese: 賠償金並不來自於足總基金。

sentences.english: The court adjudged legal damages to her.
sentences.chinese: 法院將法定損害賠償金判給了她。

sentences.english: Much of the compensation has been invested in order to provide educational and health services for members of the iwi.
sentences.chinese: 相當一部分賠償金用在了毛利人的教育和健康服務。

sentences.english: Kwame Kilpatrick will pay a million dollars in restitution and lose his law license.
sentences.chinese: 他將會支付一百萬賠償金並被吊銷律師牌照。

sentences.english: Professional readers play your eyes writers who plagiarize can be taken to civer cort civil court and order ordered to pay damsiersdamages.
sentences.chinese: 專業抄襲的作者能被帶到民事法院並命令付賠償金。

sentences.english: The paper got clobbered with libel damages of half a million pounds.
sentences.chinese: 這家報紙被罰以五十萬英鎊的誹謗損害賠償金。

sentences.english: Where a death is caused, damages for the death and funeral must also be paid.
sentences.chinese: 造成死亡的，還應當賠償喪葬費和死亡賠償金。

sentences.english: Compensation covers the cost of cleaning up, marine life protection and losses to businesses.
sentences.chinese: 賠償金包括清污費用，海洋物種保護金和商業損失。

sentences.english: He paid out $24,000 in damages, but wouldn't apologize.
sentences.chinese: 他付出了兩萬四千美元的賠償金，但拒絕道歉。

sentences.english: We have even seen the compensation Afghan civilians have received from the MoD.
sentences.chinese: 我們甚至已經看到阿富汗平民從國防部拿到了賠償金。

sentences.english: Haemophiliacs are seeking compensation for being given contaminated blood.
sentences.chinese: 血友病患者由於被注射了感染的血液而尋求賠償金。

sentences.english: Personal injury, bodily injury, you pay a certain amount of money.
sentences.chinese: 對人身傷害和身體傷害你也可以支付賠償金。

sentences.english: The court ordered Party A to pay $10,000 damages to Party B for the loss sustained.
sentences.chinese: 法庭判令甲方就乙方所受損失給付一萬美元的賠償金。

definition: restitution/return of something to its original owner/remittance
to ask for compensation/to claim damages/claim for damages
to break a promise/to violate an agreement/to default (on a loan or contract)
to bear joint responsibility for sth/joint liability (law)
common plea/civil appeal (as opposed to criminal case)
to repay a debt in kind or by labor
